name: Theft report
query:
select
    item as "TCIL Code",
    udise_code as "UDISE Code",
    apple as "School Name",
    district as "District",
    block as "Block",
    pincode as "Pin code",
    euipment_lost as "Equipment Lost",
    equipment_name as "Equipment Name",
    date_of_incident as "Date of Incident",
    quantity_stolen as "Quantity Stolen",
    reason as "Reason",
    equipment_insured as "Equipment Insured",
    covered_under_insurance as "Comes Under Insurance"
from `tabTheft Case record`;
